name: INCL01
value_as_string: Males and postmenopausal females at least 50 years of age.

name: INCL02
value_as_string: Diagnosis of probable AD as defined by NINCDS and the ADRDA guidelines (Protocol Attachment LZZT.7).

name: INCL03
value_as_string: MMSE score of 10 to 23.

name: INCL04
value_as_string: Modified Hachinski Ischemic Scale score of <= 4. (Protocol Attachment LZZT.8).

name: INCL05
value_as_string: CNS imaging (CT scan or MRI of brain) compatible with AD within past 1 year.

name: INCL06
value_as_string: Investigator has obtained informed consent signed by the patient (and/or legal representative) and by the caregiver.

name: INCL07
value_as_string: Geographic proximity to investigator's site that allows adequate follow-up.

name: INCL08
value_as_string: Caregiverwill monitor administration of prescribed medications, and will be responsible for the overall care of the patient at home.

name: EXCL09
value_as_string: Persons who have previously completed or withdrawn from this study or any other investigating xanomeline TTS or the oral formulation of xanomeline.

name: EXCL10
value_as_string: Use of any investigational agent or approved Alzheimer's therapeutic medication within 30 days prior to enrollment into the study.

name: EXCL11
value_as_string: Serious illness which required hospitalization within 3 months of screening.

name: EXCL12
value_as_string: Diagnosis of serious neurological conditions.

name: EXCL13
value_as_string: Episode of depression meeting DSM-IV criteria within 3 months of screening.

name: EXCL14
value_as_string: A history of mental illness within the last 5 years.

name: EXCL15
value_as_string: A history of syncope within the last 5 years.

name: EXCL16
value_as_string: Evidence from ECG recording at screening of any listed condition.

name: EXCL17
value_as_string: A history within the last 5 years of a serious cardiovascular disorder.

name: EXCL18
value_as_string: A history within the last 5 years of a serious gastrointestinal disorder.

name: EXCL19
value_as_string: A history within the last 5 years of a serious endocrine disorder.

name: EXCL20
value_as_string: A history within the last 5 years of a serious respiratory disorder (see list).

name: EXCL21
value_as_string: A history within the last 5 years of a serious genitourinary disorder.

name: EXCL22
value_as_string: A history within the last 5 years of a serious rheumatologic disorder.

name: EXCL23
value_as_string: A known history of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) within the last 5 years.

name: EXCL24
value_as_string: A history within the last 5 years of a serious infectious disease (see list in protocol).

name: EXCL25
value_as_string: A history within the last 5 years of a primary or recurrent malignant disease (with exceptions, see list in protocol).

name: EXCL26
value_as_string: Visual, hearing, or communication disabilities impairing the ability to participate in the study; (for example, inability to speak or understand English, illiteracy).

name: EXCL27
value_as_string: Laboratory test values exceeding the Lilly Reference Range III for the patient's age in any of the following analytes: creatinine, total bilirubin, SGOT, SGPT, etc.

name: EXCL28
value_as_string: Central laboratory test values below reference range for folate, and vitamin B12, and outside reference range for thyroid function tests.

name: EXCL29
value_as_string: Positive syphilis screening with confirmatory testing.

name: EXCL30
value_as_string: Central laboratory test value above reference range for glycosylated hemoglobin (A1C) (insulin dependent diabetes mellitus patients only).

name: EXCL31
value_as_string: Treatment with medications within 1 month prior to enrollment (see list).

value_as_string: mg

value_as_string: Alzheimer's Disease (Disorder)

name: Trial Indication Type
value_as_string: TREATMENT

name: Trial Length
value_as_string: P26W

name: Trial Primary Objective
value_as_string: To determine if there is a statistically significant relationship between the change in both ADAS-Cog and CIBIC+ scores, and drug dose (0, 50 cm2 [54 mg], and 75 cm2 [81 mg])

name: Trial Primary Objective
value_as_string: To document the safety profile of the xanomeline TTS.

name: Trial Secondary Objective
value_as_string: To assess the dose-dependent improvement in behavior. Improved scores on the Revised Neuropsychiatric Inventory (NPI-X) will indicate improvement in these areas.

name: Trial Secondary Objective
value_as_string: To assess the dose-dependent improvements in activities of daily living. Improved scores on the Disability Assessment for Dementia (DAD) will indicate improvement in these areas.

name: Trial Secondary Objective
value_as_string: To assess the dose-dependent improvements in an extended assessment of cognition that integrates attention/concentration tasks. The ADAS-Cog (14) will be used for this assessment.

name: Trial Secondary Objective
value_as_string: To assess the treatment response as a function of Apo E genotype.

name: Trial Phase Classification
value_as_string: PHASE II TRIAL
